title: Advancer Tina
synopsis: There is something very dangerous about planet Omega 13. Whatever it is, it's been killing Advancers sent out, one by one, to investigate. The Domestic Union of Arms is perplexed, so top DUA officer Mugal decides to give the job to the most dangerous, most independent, and most expendable Advancer they could find.
staff: [['Fukumoto, Kan', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Takakuwa, Hajime', ['Sound Director']], ['Ooshiro, Tsutomu', ['Key Animation']]]
